Title: Leading Well Through Growing Pains of Business
Description:
Today we’ll hear about:

•       How to expand your business without putting your current business in danger

•       A caller who made $1.6 million using three simple principles

•       What to do when you don’t like debt, but your industry is driven by financing

•       How to remain connected with your team when you’re not in the trenches with them daily
